technology.short_description: Large numbers of ill-trained, ill-equipped warriors can still perform a useful function.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Witnessing friendly expendable units rout does not reduce other units' leadership, unless they are themselves expendable.

technology.short_description: A Warlord’s rule will only ever be as effective as his enforcers allow it to be.
Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrats unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.short_description: Born from the fusion of Skaven with a range of horrific creatures, Rat Ogres are bereft of reason and almost devoid of sanity.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% for Rat Ogre and Mutant Rat Ogre units
Charge bonus: +15 for Rat Ogre and Mutant Rat Ogre units

technology.short_description: A misshapen mountain of flesh and muscle, with mechanical parts grafted on. Very nasty.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Hell Pit Abomination units
Melee attack: +5 for Hell Pit Abomination units

technology.short_description: A host of holy horrors to direct our aimless dance.

effects.description: Adds a Hell Pit Abomination unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building
Recruit rank: +2 for Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogres and Hell Pit Abomination units

technology.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.
Lack of food can be a great motivator.
There is always value in a lightning strike to harvest useful items, whatever they may be.
Yes-yes, take all of it! Yes, all - we can split-divide the spoils later- trust me, yes-yes!
We are the Children of the Horned Rat, survivors all and as we were here before you, so shall we be present to see you fall.
"Treat ‘em mean, keep ‘em keen!"
Devouring their way to domination over their lesser littermates, the freaks of the brood are always a Packmaster’s preferred choice.

effects.description: Bonus vs Infantry: +5 for Wolf Rat and Brood Horror units
Weapon strength: +10% for Wolf Rat and Brood Horror units

technology.short_description: The more the clan knows about breeding the nastiest traits into the most vicious rat-beasts, the better!

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for Wolf Rat and Brood Horror units
Upkeep: -5% for Wolf Rats and Brood Horror units

technology.short_description: Those who display a willingness to betray their own, and just the right amount of vicious savagery, find themselves progressing within the Skaven hierarchy.

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Warlock Engineers and Eshin Sorcerers
Ammunition: +20% for Doomwheels, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Doomwheels, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units

technology.short_description: Bad workmen are the same the world over…

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Doomwheel and Doom-Flayers units
Armour: +10 for Plagueclaw Catapult, Doom-Flayers, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
Missile strength: +10% for Plague Claw Catapults, Warp Lightning Cannons and Doomwheel units

technology.short_description: Casualties mean little when your population literally breed like rats.
The tide of monstrous rats flowed over them one by one, dragging them down to be torn apart…
Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrats unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.short_description: It's always best to test a new concoction before unleashing it on the enemy.

effects.description: Missile strength: +10% for Skaven Weapons Team units
Range: +10% for Skaven Weapon Team units

technology.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrats unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.short_description: Masks and armoured suits are useful, not just for protecting Skaven from the enemy, but also from their own crazy contraptions...

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Skaven Weapon Team units

technology.short_description: Woe betide any who raise their voices to decry, or even question, the decisions of their betters.
A wise warlord stockpiles ammunition long before it is needed.

effects.description: Adds an extra Plagueclaw Catapult unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building
Upkeep: -5% for Skaven Weapon Team units
Ammunition: +25% for Missile Infantry and Skaven Weapon Team units

technology.short_description: It’s hard to imagine, but there are some among this most venal, treacherous race who don't quite make the grade or indeed live much longer…

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for Skaven Weapon Team units

technology.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.
It means nothing if Skavenslaves die meeting a quota, there will always be more - many more - where they came from.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -5% for Skavenslaves and Clanrats units

technology.short_description: If you want something done right, it's best to publicly kill the one who did it wrong so the others learn.
Their vast network of underground tunnels enable the Skaven to move around the world largely undetected.
All the screams, the contortions, the howls of agony don't mean much unless the end result is useable and, more importantly, repeatable.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +2 for Plague Priests

technology.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to its ultimate conclusion.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrats unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.short_description: Selective breeding and genetic manipulation will breed the strongest Skaven yet.

effects.description: Replaces all Clanrats units spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building with Stormvermin

technology.short_description: Needless to say, any Clanrats with ideas above their stations are quickly, and permanently, silenced.
To make the foe see, hear and smell something else entirely, and then exploit their confusion - that's war taken to the next level.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Plague Monks units

technology.short_description: It's easier to influence matters when many above ground don't believe you exist...
Skaven covet Warpstone above all else; the ability to mutate weeds out the weak and strengthens those who are already strong.
We-us get in there and kill-slay until they're mostly all dead, then we get out again - let second wave mop up, yes-yes!
There is nowhere to hide, nowhere safe to conspire, that isn't watched by agents of the Council.
Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrats unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.short_description: A little more nightshade, a little less mandrake… good-perfect, Lizard-things won't stand a chance, yes-yes!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Plague Monks units

technology.short_description: No corruption too great, no disease too foul; if the Skaven want territory above-ground they will stop at nothing to acquire it.

effects.description: Adds an extra Plague Monk unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

Skaven corruption in adjacent provinces: +1
	(all provinces)

technology.short_description: The small number who survive the vigorous selection process are well equipped and given a share of the spoils to ensure their future loyalty.

effects.description: Adds a Doomwheel unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building
Recruit rank: +2 for Stormvermin, Death Runners and Eshin Triads units

technology.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.
Whereby war's notional rulebook is tossed away in favour of unbridled, fiendish savagery.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
Missile strength: +10% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units

technology.short_description: What to do when the agent you require works for another clan, who clearly do not appreciate his talents?

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
Recruitment cost: -5% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units

technology.short_description: Research the following items to advance the Skaven's vicious, uncompromising agenda to another level altogether.

effects.description: Adds an extra Clanrats unit to the army spawned from "The Vermintide" Under-City building

technology.short_description: Fear of being dragged away and killed is another great motivator.

effects.description: Leadership: +10 for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units
Weapon strength: +10% for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units
Charge bonus: +10 for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units

technology.short_description: Unsurprisingly, even more shouting, combined with terrible punishments, does tend to yield the desired results.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units

technology.short_description: The advanced skills Skaven assassins learn in the Far East appear quite alien, but are no less effective when practised at home.
It's difficult to imagine the Skaven concept of malfeasance, but it must exist; ‘criminals’ are put to work, as an alternative to an agonising death.
There is always high demand for assassins willing to murder for someone who needs to keep their own hands clean.

effects.description:
Assassinate action: Additional 5% success chance
	(all Heroes)

technology.short_description: If you wish to survive the turbulent, cutthroat world of Skaven politics you need loyal warriors on your side.
